Cameroon has a historical penchant for delivering stellar performances in West Africa, having secured three AFCON titles in the region.
Guinea has shown remarkable progress over the past five to seven years, reaching the knockout stages in the previous competition.
Guinea has encountered only one defeat in their last six matches, securing four victories and a draw.
